channel.title: "Start Server"---
channel.description:
yea clicking on that..and then just logging in isn't working.. it says on here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/index.php
taht i can just click start server and it'll work..i know theres something wrong or i don't have all the things needed to play but..any help?
should i just download the downloadable version i've been able to log onto that one for a few minutes..but never on the web one.

item.title: "Start Server"---
item.dc:creator: @ownageownt ownageownt
item.description:
@ownageownt wrote:

Ok, you seem like a nice guy, the kind I would like to help out.

Step 1: Run your server like you did before.

Step 2: Go to client.

Step 3: Type in a username and password, but not an ip.

Step 4: Log in.

Read full topic

item.title: "Start Server"---
item.dc:creator: @Peter234 Peter234
item.description:
@Peter234 wrote:

Start server is for starting your own server and it’s a little complicated…You have to have ALOT. Or play somebody elses and heres a better URL: http://client.silabsoft.org for a server go to http://moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php Pick one and log into it. the silab url is for newer items.
